insert into dealinfo
dealInfoId,
dealNo,
dealPerson,
dealTime,
goodsDesc,
enabled,

mapper.update:
update dealinfo
dealInfoId = #{updated.dealinfoid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dealNo = #{updated.dealno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dealPerson = #{updated.dealperson,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dealTime = #{updated.dealtime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
goodsDesc = #{updated.goodsdesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
enabled = #{updated.enabled,jdbcType=TINYINT},
where 1=1
and dealInfoId=#{dealinfoid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
